description: Create a connection between a functionapp and a target resource.

commands.name: az functionapp connection create app-insights
commands.summary: Create a functionapp connection to app-insights.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp connection create app-insights [--app-insights]
                                              [--appconfig-id]
                                              [--client-type {dotnet, dotnet-internal, go, java, nodejs, none, python}]
                                              [--connection]
                                              [--connstr-props]
                                              [--customized-keys]
                                              [--name]
                                              [--no-wait]
                                              [--opt-out {auth, configinfo, publicnetwork}]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--secret]
                                              [--source-id]
                                              [--target-id]
                                              [--target-resource-group]
                                              [--vault-id]
examples: az functionapp connection create app-insights -g FuncAppRG -n MyFunctionApp --tg AppInsightsRG --app-insights MyAppInsights --secret

commands.name: az functionapp connection create appconfig
commands.summary: Create a functionapp connection to appconfig.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp connection create appconfig [--app-config]
                                           [--appconfig-id]
                                           [--client-type {dotnet, dotnet-internal, java, nodejs, none, python}]
                                           [--connection]
                                           [--connstr-props]
                                           [--customized-keys]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--no-wait]
                                           [--opt-out {auth, configinfo, publicnetwork}]
                                           [--private-endpoint {false, true}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--secret]
                                           [--service-principal]
                                           [--source-id]
                                           [--system-identity]
                                           [--target-id]
                                           [--target-resource-group]
                                           [--user-identity]
                                           [--vault-id]
examples: az functionapp connection create appconfig -g FuncAppRG -n MyFunctionApp --tg AppconfigRG --app-config MyConfigStore --system-identity

commands.name: az functionapp connection create cognitiveservices
commands.summary: Create a functionapp connection to cognitiveservices.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp connection create cognitiveservices [--account]
                                                   [--appconfig-id]
                                                   [--client-type {dotnet, none, python}]
                                                   [--connection]
                                                   [--connstr-props]
                                                   [--customized-keys]
                                                   [--name]
                                                   [--no-wait]
                                                   [--opt-out {auth, configinfo, publicnetwork}]
                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                   [--secret]
                                                   [--service-principal]
                                                   [--source-id]
                                                   [--system-identity]
                                                   [--target-id]
                                                   [--target-resource-group]
                                                   [--user-identity]
                                                   [--vault-id]
examples: az functionapp connection create cognitiveservices -g FuncAppRG -n MyFunctionApp --tg CognitiveServicesRG --account MyAccount --system-identity

commands.name: az functionapp connection create confluent-cloud
commands.summary: Create a functionapp connection to confluent-cloud.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp connection create confluent-cloud --bootstrap-server
                                                 --kafka-key
                                                 --kafka-secret
                                                 --schema-key
                                                 --schema-registry
                                                 --schema-secret
                                                 [--appconfig-id]
                                                 [--client-type {dotnet, dotnet-internal, go, java, none, python, springBoot}]
                                                 [--connection]
                                                 [--customized-keys]
                                                 [--name]
                                                 [--no-wait]
                                                 [--opt-out {auth, configinfo, publicnetwork}]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--source-id]
                                                 [--vault-id]
examples: az functionapp connection create confluent-cloud -g FuncAppRG -n MyFunctionApp --bootstrap-server xxx.eastus.azure.confluent.cloud:9092 --kafka-key Name --kafka-secret Secret --schema-registry https://xxx.eastus.azure.confluent.cloud --schema-key Name --schema-secret Secret

commands.name: az functionapp connection create mysql
commands.summary: Create a functionapp connection to mysql.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp connection create mysql [--appconfig-id]
                                       [--client-type {django, dotnet, dotnet-internal, go, java, nodejs, none, php, python, ruby, springBoot}]
                                       [--connection]
                                       [--connstr-props]
                                       [--customized-keys]
                                       [--database]
                                       [--name]
                                       [--no-wait]
                                       [--opt-out {auth, configinfo, publicnetwork}]
                                       [--private-endpoint {false, true}]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--secret]
                                       [--server]
                                       [--service-endpoint {false, true}]
                                       [--source-id]
                                       [--target-id]
                                       [--target-resource-group]
                                       [--vault-id]
examples: az functionapp connection create mysql -g FuncAppRG -n MyFunctionApp --tg MysqlRG --server MyServer --database MyDB --secret name=XX secret=XX

az functionapp connection create mysql --source-id /subscriptions/{subscription}/resourceGroups/{source_resource_group}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{site} --target-id /subscriptions/{subscription}/resourceGroups/{target_resource_group}/providers/Microsoft.DBForMySQL/servers/{server}/databases/{database} --secret name=XX secret=XX
